title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.

Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2006/07 to 2007/08, slightly decreasing from 2007/08 to 2008/09, slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, and finally roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2010/11.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2007/08 and 2008/09.
Maximum Revenue in million euros, about 1925.26 was reported at Year 2007/08
The lowest Revenue in million euros, of value 907.0 was reported at Year 2008/09
